settings.heading: Does the Backvac® meet standards of an airline carry-on?
settings.row_content: Backvac®: Approved hand luggage size for most airlines!

settings.heading: What is the maximum and best size for the laptop and tablet compartment in the Backvac®?
settings.row_content:
Discover the ideal solution for laptops of all sizes, complete with dedicated compartments for secure and convenient storage.

  • Backvac Pro (17-inch): 
    Roomy and durable, built to accommodate larger laptops with additional space and enhanced protection.

settings.heading: What is the main fabric for the Backvac®?
settings.row_content: Backvac® stands out with exceptional durability, crafted from premium materials. The main fabrics, ultra-durable Premium Am-Way and Polyester, provide long-lasting resilience. What truly sets us apart is our advanced TPU coatings on the compression components, delivering unmatched flexibility and strength. With Backvac®, you're not just carrying a bag—you're choosing quality and cutting-edge technology.

settings.heading: How does the compression technology work?
settings.row_content:
The provided instructions outline a simple and efficient process for compressing clothes or belongings you want to compress.

1. Pack your clothes or belongings inside the bag.

2. Zip it closed securely.

3. Utilize the Backvac Air Pump to compress and vacuum-seal your items, ensuring maximum space efficiency.

settings.heading: How much does the Backvac® backpack weigh?
settings.row_content: The Backvac® weighs 3 lbs before being filled. With clothes expect it to weigh anywhere from 15-22 lbs or 6-10 kgs.

settings.heading: Can the Backvac® fit under an airplane seat?
settings.row_content: Yes, it fits under an airplane seat on most airlines. Check with your airline provider prior to your flight.

settings.heading: How does the charge port in the Backvac® work? Does it include a battery? What kind of cable does it support?
settings.row_content: We've included a dedicated compartment inside the Backvac® for your power bank. To avoid airline restrictions, it’s not built-in. You can easily connect almost any power bank to Backvac®, which features both USB-A and USB-C ports for added convenience.

settings.heading: What devices can I connect to the USB port?
Do you have a patent on this product?
settings.row_content: We have all design patents for our design.

settings.heading: I am interested in collaborating with Backvac®. What steps should I take?
settings.row_content: Please email us at hello@mybackvac.com with comprehensive details of your collaboration ideas with Backvac®. We appreciate your dedication!

settings.heading: Is the Backvac for both men and women?
I can't find the FAQ I'm looking for. Can I e-mail you?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can e-mail us at: hello@mybackvac.com
